description: Details of Condition 4b 'Security Measures' in relation to Buildings B and C pursuant to planning permission ref. 22/AP/2196 for 'Variation of condition 1 (Approved Plans) pursuant to planning permission 20/AP/2482 (Construction of four, part two/part three storey buildings incorporating roof terraces, for a temporary period of not more than seven years comprising uses including education in Building A (Use Class F1) and flexible education and office and ancillary uses (Use Classes F1 and E) in Buildings B, C and D, and associated refuse storage, cycle parking, electric substation and temporary landscaping.)The following amendments are sought in order to accommodate a Life Science Operator Combine buildings B and C into a single building Creation of additional floor area by infilling the space between Buildings B and C and building additional space at second floor level on the south elevation Installation of external flues Increased height to accommodate enhanced service zone and plant for future occupiers Increased development area to meet space demands and provide lab space (+1,111 sqm)General amendments to building layout, access and shared amenity, including increased floor to ceiling heightsExternal escape stairs for increased floorplate flexibilityBuilding BC entrance relocated to the middle of the buildingTerraces re-allocated to provide a mixture of external terrace typesClarification over materiality for Building BC'.
